00020 #ifndef __mat_file_defs__
00021 #define __mat_file_defs__
00022 
00023 // Mat-file datatypes
00024 #define miINT8          1
00025 #define miUINT8         2
00026 #define miINT16         3
00027 #define miUINT16        4
00028 #define miINT32         5
00029 #define miUINT32        6
00030 #define miSINGLE        7
00031 #define miDOUBLE        9
00032 #define miINT64         12
00033 #define miUINT64        13
00034 #define miMATRIX        14
00035 
00036 // Matlab array types
00037 #define mxCELL_CLASS    1
00038 #define mxSTRUCT_CLASS  2
00039 #define mxOBJECT_CLASS  3
00040 #define mxCHAR_CLASS    4
00041 #define mxSPARSE_CLASS  5
00042 #define mxDOUBLE_CLASS  6
00043 #define mxSINGLE_CLASS  7
00044 #define mxINT8_CLASS    8
00045 #define mxUINT8_CLASS   9
00046 #define mxINT16_CLASS   10
00047 #define mxUINT16_CLASS  11
00048 #define mxINT32_CLASS   12
00049 #define mxUINT32_CLASS  13
00050 
00051 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(WIN32)
00052 #include <io.h>
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #include <fcntl.h>
00056 
00057 #ifdef HAVE_UNISTD_H
00058 #include <unistd.h>
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #include <stdio.h>
00062 #include <string.h>
00063 
00064 #if (defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(WIN32)) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00065 bool mWrite1(int file, __int8 a) {
00066 #else
00067 bool mWrite1(int file, int8_t a) {
00068 #endif
00069         bool res = (write(file, &a, 1) == 1);
00070         
00071         return res;
00072 }
00073 
00074 #if (defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(WIN32)) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00075 bool mWrite2(int file, __int16 a) {
00076 #else
00077 bool mWrite2(int file, int16_t a) {
00078 #endif
00079         bool res = (write(file, &a, 2) == 2);
00080         
00081         return res;
00082 }
00083 
00084 #if (defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(WIN32)) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00085 bool mWrite4(int file, __int32 a) {
00086 #else
00087 bool mWrite4(int file, int32_t a) {
00088 #endif
00089         bool res = (write(file, &a, 4) == 4);
00090         
00091         return res;
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool mWriteDouble(int file, double a) {
00095         bool res = (write(file, &a, 8) == 8);
00096         
00097         return res;
00098 };
00099 
00100 bool mWriteName(int file, const char * name) {
00101         int lname = MIN(strlen(name),4);
00102         if ( !mWrite2(file,miINT8) ) return false;
00103         if ( !mWrite2(file,lname) ) return false;
00104         if (strlen(name) < 4) {
00105                 switch ( strlen(name) ) {
00106                 case 1:
00107                         if ( !mWrite1(file,*name) ) return false;
00108                         if ( !mWrite1(file,0) ) return false;
00109                         if ( !mWrite1(file,0) ) return false;
00110                         if ( !mWrite1(file,0) ) return false;
00111                         break;
00112                 case 2:
00113                         if ( !mWrite1(file,*name) ) return false;
00114                         if ( !mWrite1(file,*(name+1)) ) return false;
00115                         if ( !mWrite1(file,0) ) return false;
00116                         if ( !mWrite1(file,0) ) return false;
00117                         break;
00118                 case 3:
00119                         if ( !mWrite1(file,*name) ) return false;
00120                         if ( !mWrite1(file,*(name+1)) ) return false;
00121                         if ( !mWrite1(file,*(name+2)) ) return false;
00122                         if ( !mWrite1(file,0) ) return false;
00123                         break;
00124                 }
00125         } else {
00126                 if ( !mWrite1(file,*name) ) return false;
00127                 if ( !mWrite1(file,*(name+1)) ) return false;
00128                 if ( !mWrite1(file,*(name+2)) ) return false;
00129                 if ( !mWrite1(file,*(name+3)) ) return false;
00130         }
00131         return true;
00132 };
00133 
00134 #endif
